metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Back to the Future Theme is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Back to the Future Theme has sections analyzed in the following keys: C♯ Mixolydian, A♭ Major, D♭ Major, A Lydian,  and F Lydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
